snippet.title: EVE Online: Lifeblood Feature Tour
snippet.description:
Lifeblood, the new EVE Online expansion, is coming on 24 October! Here is the feature tour that you can watch in super high quality 4K at 60 frames per second.
Fuel the galaxy's fire and join the Resource Wars, build new Refineries and enjoy major updates to moon mining. The Agency session finder allows you to jump straight into the action with short session, co-op gameplay, as well as multiple player roles and strategy.

With the increased pirate activity in Empire space, form player battle fleets and attack Blood Raider and Guristas bases for rewards.

Further new features include competing for glory and riches by putting wagers on duels, new mining ship SKINs, the new mining ledger and a CONCORD Battleship redesign.

Play EVE Online for free, forever, at http://www.eveonline.com

To check out current, past, and future updates to EVE Online, head over to https://updates.eveonline.com
